im trying to play lan what is ipx protocol can u giv me step by step insstructions on how to get lan working?

firefox, you mus enable IPX in the computers in your LAN, then when you play the game go to options then network.

In the second drop down box in the network options menu, there is a list of three mac addresses, change this setting on each computer until it works.

If you still have problems, post again here and I will see what I can do (remember to seed!!!)

Why would you wanna seed crap?

1) To play online you need a valid serial key - buy the game
2) You can play LAN over internet using Hamachi (google it)
3) Use this patch: http://www.understorm.net/cnc/lan/ts_ra2.php for playing over network on vista
4) To play on vista, set the compatability of ra2.exe to 2000 or XP, and right click ra2.exe and click Run as Administrator
